articles.description: Who’s Hernan Reyes and why did Dom steal his vault? Who’s Cipher, why did she kill Elena, and what’s up with Shaw? Here are the Fast and Furious facts you need.
articles.content: The latest movie in the Fast and Furious franchise, Fast X, periodically stops for quick recaps and overviews of the past nine movies. There are so many callbacks and follow-ups in this movie that it… [+5069 chars]

articles.author: Catherine Bray
articles.title: ‘An irresistible mix of art and genitals’: Caligula finally comes to Cannes - The Guardian
articles.description: Described by its screenwriter, Gore Vidal, as ‘easily one of the worst films ever made’, Caligula has been re-edited by Thomas Negovan and received its premiere this week. Here, he explains his decision to revisit the swords-and-sandals shockfest
articles.content: As quixotic quests go, its a doozy: take 96 hours of raw footage filmed during one of the craziest and most tumultuous shoots in movie history and attempt to create a new version of the film describe… [+5640 chars]

articles.title: Adidas hit with anti-trans backlash over Pride swimsuit - PinkNews
articles.description: Transphobes are once again losing their minds over trans-inclusion, but this time it is Adidas’s pride collection at the centre of their ire.
articles.content:
Transphobes are once again in arms over a minor moment of trans-inclusion this time it is Adidass Pride collection that has drawn the attention of their ire.
